ANU.name: Barry Yau
expertise: Legal Practice Lawyering And The Legal Profession
interest: Presently Barry's main research interest is student attitudes to the study of commercial law and the role legal ethics has in preparing students for commercial practice.  Barry is also interested in demistifying the study of commercial law, and the depiction of lawyers in popular media.
project: Since 2014, Barry has been leading a longitudinal research project that follows a sample of law students and early career commercial lawyers.  As part of this qualitative research, Barry is exploring themes of wellness and work-life balance, along with the the factors, forces and choices shaping life, family and career paths.
